name: Aggron
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 5 cards from your deck and put them back on top of your deck in any order. This power can't be used if Aggron is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack2Text: Your opponent discards the top card of his or her deck.

name: Altaria
Ability1Text: If Drake's Stadium is in play, remove 1 damage counter from Altaria between turns.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

name: Armaldo
Attack1Text: Discard up to 5 Fighting Energy cards attached to Armaldo. For each Energy card you discarded, choose an opponent's Pokémon in play and this attack does 20 damage to those Pokémon. (You may choose the same Pokémon more than once.) This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Banette
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.
Attack2Text: Your opponent flips a number of coins equal to the number of his or her Benched Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage times the number of tails. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Blaziken
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. This power can't be used if Blaziken is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Discard a Fire Energy card attached to Blaziken. This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Charizard
Attack2Text: Each Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

name: Cradily
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, when you play Cradily from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may search your deck for up to 3 in any combination of Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards. Show them to your opponent and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Delcatty
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard 1 Energy card from your hand. Then draw up to 3 cards from your deck. This power can't be used if Delcatty is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the amount of Energy attached to all of your Active Pokémon.

name: Gardevoir
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Psychic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Gardevoir is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the total amount of Energy attached to Gardevoir and the Defending Pokémon.

name: Kabutops
Ability1Text: As long as Kabutops is your Active Pokémon, your opponent can't play any Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards from his or her hand to evolve his or her Active Pokémon.
Attack1Text: Before doing damage, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and switch it with 1 of the Defending Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 20 damage to the new Defending Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokémon to switch.

name: Machamp
Ability1Text: If your opponent has any Pokémon-ex in play, each of Machamp's attacks does 30 more damage to the Defending Pokémon.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Raichu
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to Raichu.
Attack2Text: Discard all Energy cards attached to Raichu.

name: Slaking
Ability1Text: As long as Slaking is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Pokémon can't use any Poké-Powers.
Attack1Text: Discard a basic Energy card attached to Slaking or this attack does nothing. Slaking can't attack during your next turn.

name: Dusclops
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: If Phoebe's Stadium is in play, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Lanturn
Ability1Text: Once during your opponent's turn, when any of your Pokémon is Knocked Out by your opponent's attacks, you may use this power. Choose a basic Energy card discarded from the Knocked Out Pokémon and attach it to Lanturn. You can't use more than 1 Energy Grounding Poké-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: You may discard all Lightning Energy attached to Lanturn. If you do, this attack's base damage is 90 instead of 50.

name: Magneton
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have basic Energy cards in your discard pile, you may discard any 1 card from your hand. Then search for up to 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. You can't return the card you first discarded to your hand in this way. This power can't be used if Magneton is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the amount of Energy attached to all of your Pokémon (including Magneton).

name: Mawile
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: If your opponent has 5 or more cards in his or her hand, your opponent discards a number of cards until your opponent has 4 cards left in his or her hand.

name: Mightyena
Attack1Text: Before doing damage, discard all Trainer cards attached to the Defending Pokémon.
Attack2Text: If Sidney's Stadium is in play, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Ninetales
Ability1Text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Ninetales by your opponent's Pokémon-ex.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Omastar
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Evolved Pokémon in play, remove the highest Stage Evolution card from each of them and put those cards back into his or her hand.
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Omastar but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 40 damage in this way.

name: Pichu
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Pikachu from your hand onto Pichu (this counts as evolving Pichu) and remove all damage counters from Pichu.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Lightning Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-ex), show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Sableye
Ability1Text: If Phoebe's Stadium is in play, prevent all damage done to Sableye by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon-ex.
Attack1Text: Draw 2 cards from the bottom of your deck.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

name: Seviper
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokémon between turns.

name: Wobbuffet
Ability1Text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Wobbuffet by your opponent's Pokémon-ex.
Attack1Text: Wobbuffet does 10 damage to itself, and don't apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.

name: Zangoose
Ability1Text: Zangoose can't be affected by any Special Conditions.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Anorith
Ability1Text: Any damage done to Anorith by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. If 1 of them is heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage. If 2 of them are heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage. If all of them are heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 50 more damage.

name: Cacturne
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Sidney's Stadium is in play, you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Poisoned. This power can't be used if Cacturne is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Charmeleon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack or retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Combusken
Ability1Text: When you attach a Fire Energy card from your hand to Combusken, remove all Special Conditions from Combusken.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Glalie
Ability1Text: If Glacia's Stadium is in play, any damage done to Glalie by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Glalie does 10 damage to itself.

name: Kirlia
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokémon is not Asleep, this attack does nothing.

name: Lairon
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Lairon by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Machoke
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Medicham
Ability1Text: As long as Medicham is your Active Pokémon, attacks by each player's Active Pokémon do 10 more damage to any Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Metang
Ability1Text: Metang can't be affected by any Special Conditions.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Extra Comet Punch does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Nuzleaf
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Sealeo
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Sharpedo
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Put 1 damage counter on Sharpedo.

name: Shelgon
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Shelgon.

name: Vibrava
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Vigoroth
Ability1Text: If Vigoroth is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Vigoroth is Knocked Out), put 1 damage counter on the Attacking Pokémon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Aron
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for an Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

name: Bagon
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Bagon.

name: Baltoy
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Beldum
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, move a basic Energy card from the Defending Pokémon to another of your opponent's Pokémon. (Ignore this effect if your opponent has only 1 Pokémon.)

name: Cacnea
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

name: Carvanha
Ability1Text: If Carvanha is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Carvanha is Knocked Out), put 1 damage counter on the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Charmander
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Chinchou
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Duskull
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Kabuto
Attack1Text: Search your deck for an Evolution card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Lileep
Attack1Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Machop
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Machop does 10 damage to itself.

name: Magnemite
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Meditite
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Omanyte
Attack1Text: Search your deck for Omanyte, Kabuto, Aerodactyl, Lileep, or Anorith and put up to 2 of them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. Treat the new Benched Pokémon as Basic Pokémon.

name: Pikachu
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to Pikachu.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Poochyena
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Ralts
Attack2Text: Switch Ralts with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Seedot
Attack1Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Seedot.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 times the number of heads.

name: Shuppet
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Skitty
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: Slakoth
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. That Pokémon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: Snorunt
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Spheal
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Spheal during your opponent's next turn.

name: Swablu
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Torchic
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

name: Trapinch
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Vulpix
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Vulpix.

name: Wynaut
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Wobbuffet from your hand onto Wynaut (this counts as evolving Wynaut) and remove all damage counters from Wynaut.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Wynaut.

name: Claw Fossil
Ability1Text: If Claw Fossil is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Claw Fossil is Knocked Out), put 1 damage counter on the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Root Fossil
Ability1Text: At any time between turns, remove 1 damage counter from Root Fossil.

name: Absol ex
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, when you put Absol ex from your hand onto your Bench, you may move 3 damage counters from 1 of your opponent's Pokémon to another of his or her Pokémon.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Claydol ex
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Claydol ex's type is Fighting until the end of your turn.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.
Attack2Text: You may discard a Psychic Energy card attached to Claydol ex. If you do, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

name: Flygon ex
Ability1Text: If Flygon ex is damaged by an opponent's attack, you may discard up to 4 cards from your hand. If you do, any damage done to Flygon ex is reduced by 10 for each card you discarded.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Flygon ex can't use Slashing Strike during your next turn.

name: Metagross ex
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Metagross ex is your Active Pokémon, you may use this power. Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck. Then, each player draws 4 cards. This power can't be used if Metagross ex is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 70 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has the same name as the Defending Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Salamence ex
Attack1Text: Discard the top 5 cards from your deck.
Attack2Text: Discard all Water Energy attached to Salamence ex. This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Shiftry ex
Attack1Text: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a Basic Pokémon or Evolution card you find there. Choose 1 of that Pokémon's attacks. Skill Hack copies that attack except for its Energy cost. (You must still do anything else required for that attack.) (No matter what type that Pokémon is, Shiftry ex's type is still Darkness.) Shiftry ex performs that attack.
Attack2Text: Does 60 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has the same name as the Defending Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Skarmory ex
Ability1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon retreats and has 40 or more remaining HP, put 3 damage counters on that Pokémon. You can't use more than 1 Metal Gravity Poké-Body each turn.
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

name: Walrein ex
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, when you play Walrein ex from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may use this power. Your opponent can't play any Trainer cards from his or her hand during your opponent's next turn.
Attack1Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 70 damage plus 20 more damage. Discard that Stadium card.

name: Flareon ★
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, when you put Flareon Star from your hand onto your Bench, you may use this power. Each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) is now Burned.
Attack1Text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Flareon Star.

name: Jolteon ★
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, when you put Jolteon Star from your hand onto your Bench, you may put 1 damage counter on each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Jolteon Star during your opponent's next turn.

name: Vaporeon ★
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, when you put Vaporeon Star from your hand onto your Bench, you may remove all Special Conditions and 3 damage counters from each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.
